⠀
Her skin, on fire.
Nails dragged across it,
leaving purple marks.

Her fingers and feet were closer
in color to her hair than skin
anymore, close to being frostbitten
as the female sat beneath the ice
cold water for hours on end.

It hurt, badly.
Everything did.
From her —
